title: The Unexpected Heroism of Yvonne Smith
summary: Over a week, 78-year-old Yvonne Smith, transforming from a simple baker and embroiderer to a neighborhood protector, confronts a mysterious force.
summaryGerman: Über eine Woche verwandelt sich die 78-jährige Yvonne Smith von einer einfachen Bäckerin und Stickerin zu einer Beschützerin der Nachbarschaft und stellt sich einer geheimnisvollen Kraft.
summaryDutch: Gedurende een week transformeert de 78-jarige Yvonne Smith van een simpele bakker en borduurder naar een buurtbeschermer die een mysterieuze kracht confronteert.
summaryFrench: Au cours d'une semaine, Yvonne Smith, 78 ans, se transforme de simple boulangère et brodeuse en protectrice du quartier, affrontant une force mystérieuse.

story.text: Yvonne Smith, while baking her signature chocolate chip cookies, notices strange flickering lights in her garden. Intrigued and a bit concerned, she decides to investigate after finishing her baking.
The lights lead Yvonne to a hidden, radiant flower that she has never seen before in her garden. As she touches it, she feels a surge of youth and vigor flowing through her.
Empowered by her newfound energy, Yvonne helps her neighbors carry heavy groceries and solve complex puzzles, all the while keeping her powers a secret.
A storm hits the town, and Yvonne, undaunted, uses her powers to protect her neighbors' homes from falling branches and flooding, knitting barriers from the air itself.
Curious about the limits of her abilities, Yvonne experiments with her power. She discovers she can make her embroidery animate, crafting protective charms for her neighbors.
The source of Yvonne's power—a celestial being—appears in her dreams, warning her of an upcoming battle that she must prepare for.
Yvonne faces off against a spectral entity threatening her community. Using all her skills, both domestic and magical, she manages to banish it, restoring peace to her neighborhood.

ending: As the week closes, Yvonne Smith, now a celebrated hero, returns to her quiet life, her heart filled with the joy of service.
moral: No matter your age or life’s routine, there lies within everyone a hero waiting to emerge.
